text: HaTnu'a () is an Israeli political party. Its ideology is social liberal, secular and Zionist. HaTnu'a was founded in 2012 by Tzipi Livni (also political leader), as a splitting from Kadima. Number of seats in the 20th Knesset: 5 (down one from 19th Knesset). HaTnu'a is cooperating with HaAvoda ("Labor") and HaTnu'a HaYeruqa ("The Green Movement") as HaMahaneh HaTziyoni (The Zionist Union). Together they have 24 seats. == Other websites == * Category:2012 establishments in Israel Category:Former political parties in Israel Category:Liberal parties Category:Zionist parties
title: Hatnua
